meanings.definition: A small North American bird with a distinctive call.
meanings.sent1: The chewink sang a sweet song in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a chewink perched on a branch outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The chewink decided to have a singing competition with the robin.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as melodious as a chewink's call.
meanings.sent5: The colorful feathers of the chewink brightened up the dull tree.

meanings.definition: To make a chewing or gnawing motion with the mouth.
meanings.sent1: I chewink my food slowly to savor the flavors.
meanings.sent2: Please do not chewink with your mouth open.
meanings.sent3: He likes to pretend he can chewink like a squirrel.
meanings.sent4: The gears of the old clock seemed to chewink as they turned.
meanings.sent5: The puppy would chewink on anything it found on the floor.

meanings.definition: A sound made while chewing or eating.
meanings.sent1: The chewink of the cookies could be heard across the room.
meanings.sent2: I tried to eat quietly, but the chewink was unavoidable.
meanings.sent3: The chewink of the popcorn made the movie even more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The silence was broken only by the gentle chewink of the cows grazing.
meanings.sent5: The chewink of the chips echoed in the empty room.
